name: The Mind Project
description: I can't say much just that is a short puzzle game that will make you feel like i felt when i decide to make games and told my family about it and how the words hurt and every step seam to be blocked by some barrier or some voice telling me to just give up and do what everybody wwant me to do https://www.facebook.com/Marcoraco-1437386513252648/ Please feedback is much appreciated :3
